title: Towel
medium: Technique: Jacquard woven, 5 harness satin damask foundation with brocaded wefts
inscribed: woven in center:"The Independence of the united States declared July 4, 1776", "Washington elected President of the Federal Union March 1789" and "E Pluribus Unum".
description: Towel with patriotic motifs and statements in white linen. Brocaded bands of pattern in red, cream and black at both ends.

tombstone.epitaph: Towel.Technique: Jacquard woven, 5 harness satin damask foundation with brocaded wefts. 1986-58-1.
